source: Wohoo kaldaye saggi Faayrashi Koroona itaa’ho at abatti on jira
Foga ileero: Mitta lamma hanjuf a kaalaabta.

translated: attissiyo ommos khannan agarte waha yeel:

source: Dafarti fool lakorsati sii: Intaas a kayarheene ommo a kaattissiyeen
Kolossoo ma khannane sugeer on iskajeyissa.
Enenyet a geeddi us khannanyahe i’daasenyi wihi tuso liiargine us enenyet khabsiicho.
Ururre goya iiran a mehe eti khannan ma garatti.
I’daasenyi hanjufti eti khannan ilassa a kidihta…..
Atin tuumman a geeddi atin khannattaan
Chirri at wahanyeyyoha baabul ’daarte at toro foolaah ’daarte
Ichoow jiti kaldaye at holisso a chirri at saabbuun
Faayras a geeddi us saha’dohoo meel kijiro
A haaggantahe chirri at waansiha raahto
Foolaah ommos fooli etoo a’daarin. Geeddi at i’daarin dahanohaah koloo saabbuun kadikh
Geedda at dikhatti  geeyoo gaaban kol lamma dowo
Wihi sugeer keeno dafartaas fool goya kasoobahaan cha’at geeddi deer gessatte
Dafarti fool chi’iche geeddoo fiddiite rog. Maalinkoo kalday akutin.
Dikkil fool ma ka’daarto koloo kalday laka.
Afaf dikkil ommos barbar kafure ommos kahid dahano birriche mee.
“This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel” by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz
“The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe”
“How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands”. By Elizabeth Rosenthal
Additional notes: Hygiene precautions in comic are effective in preventing many other common infections such as flu and cold
translated: and should be applied in every day life

source: Wori Faayrashi Koroona miinsan  Translated by Joshua Galimogle
translated: Laban Eysinkele & Joshua Borano  Wohoo kaldaye saggi Faayrashi Koroona itaa’ho at abatti on jira Saggi us itaaho’ Af Sam Indo Miilassaah Eti feyyan Eti khannan Faayras chirri  hanjufti Foga ileero: Mitta lamma hanjuf a kaalaabta. Koow Mitta lamma Attissiyo ’Deerka chirri at etoo yarho
